description: Conditional jump if top of stack is not false or nil

fields.name: target
fields.description: Absolute bytecode offset to jump to if condition is true

operation.pseudocode: value = stack.pop(); if (value != false && value != nil) instructionPointer = target
steps: If value is not false and not nil, set instruction pointer to target

notes: Only false and nil are considered false
All other values (including 0) are considered true
Pops the condition value from stack
Used to implement ifFalse: and loop exits
